articles.title: Global T20 Canada 2023: List of Pakistan players featuring in the GT20 Canada - Wisden
articles.description: The third edition of the Global T20 Canada starts on July 20. Several star Pakistan cricketers, both current and former, will be seen in action in the tournament. Here's the full list of Pakistan players playing in GT20 Canada 2023.
